summary: A Moto-based mock implementation of the Amazon Textract service, comprising custom exception definitions, backend models that manage document text extraction requests, asynchronous job handling, and result storage, along with response handlers that translate API calls into backend actions and produce JSON-formatted responses.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop applications that integrate with Amazon Textract without invoking the real service, by providing a fully simulated Textract API for local testing and CI pipelines.
